transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon, Kaushal ji.
Customer: Ha ji sir, Kaushal baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Ha, wo tha kya hai apne paas ek query aayi thi, ye Kola Kullu hai na, Kola Kullu.
Executive: Ha?
Customer: Kola Kullu se sir ek query aayi thi, form ke naam se.
Executive: Kahan se? Solapur.
Customer: Kola Kullu, T A L A K O double L U.
Executive: C O L A
Customer: Ha, Pala Kolu.
Executive: Pala Kolu?
Customer: Pala sir, T A, T for parrot, Pala Kolu.
Executive: Ha, ye kahan hai sir?
Customer: Sir aapke paas aayi na, aap se check karo ek baar lead manager mein.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Sir kal ki date mein aaya hai. Hmm, name sir inka name ha, name hai inka, uh, Om ji. Ek baar aap lead manager open karo sir.
Executive: Karta hu, ek second.
Executive: Ek, ek 15 minute time dijiye, 15-20 minute. Main aapko call karta hu.
Customer: Ha, call back kariye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks executive to check lead manager.

Resolution:

- Executive asked for 15-20 minutes to check.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- lead manager, query, callback
